Workflow.Name: Email_Edge_Emp_Matrices
Workflow.Description: The flow triggers when a new email with specific subject and attachments is received. It processes CSV attachments, extracting the date and generating a filename. The data is then sent to a database and subsequently loaded into a data warehouse. Depending on the success of the loading process, a success or failure email is sent to a distribution list, detailing the file date, filename, and any error descriptions if applicable. The email is marked as read after processing. The flow ensures that only relevant emails with attachments are handled, streamlining data management and communication.
